name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Ernest SMALIS and the E. Smalis Painting Company, Respondents

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Ernest SMALIS and the E. Smalis Painting Company, Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 1st day of April, 2003, the Commonwealth’s petition is GRANTED. Upon review of the record, we conclude there was no violation of Commonwealth v. Persinger, 532 Pa. 317, 615 A.2d 1305 (1992). Accordingly, the order of the Commonwealth Court is reversed, and the judgment of sentence is reinstated.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
820 A.2d 700
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Ernest SMALIS and the E. Smalis Painting Company, Respondents.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 1, 2003.
Reconsideration and Reargument Denied June 11, 2003.
